name: DataWorker
description:
Use A/D to move, Space to jump and left mouse button to make the battery drop immediately.

   You are a robot, responsible for a production line of battery. Unfortunately, the track broke up and you need to transport the batteries by yourself. If the battery collide with the broken track, it will cause short circuit, cause the battery to be damaged and you will lose your power as well! Successfully transport a battery will add some power to you. Be careful and delay the time as long as you can to live longer!

   This is my first game ever and I hope you will like it~
